lines.i: Records the amendmenet of a clinical document.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
Contains any remarks about the amendment.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTime with data type Point In Time
The date/time that the document was closed by amended.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reason with data type Code
Provides a reason why the document was amended.

Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
Identifies the person who ammended the document.
